nodes.bodyText:
will there always be servers?
according to https://swagger.io/specification/#fixed-fields
servers is
An array of Server Objects, which provide connectivity information to a target server. If the servers property is not provided, or is an empty array, the default value would be a Server Object with a url value of /.

Did you check this works if we have an empty list?
good point, but I guess the double slash issue is already present with the current implementation. Maybe you could open an issue for that and handle this separately? so we could merge this PR

Agreed, lets merge.
I will check if I have a minute or two the next days, to open a PR...I guess it is anyway not so urgent
